mapper.sql: SELECT id, p_name, main_cate, sub_cate, p_img, detail, price, stock, p_rank FROM Product
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product (p_name, main_cate, sub_cate, p_img, detail, price, stock, p_rank) VALUES (#{p_name}, #{main_cate}, #{sub_cate}, #{p_img}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{stock}, #{p_rank})
mapper.select: SELECT p.id, p.p_name, p.main_cate, p.sub_cate, p.p_img, p.detail, p.price , p.stock, p.p_rank, c.mainname, c.subname FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.main_cate = c.maincode AND p.sub_cate = c.subcode WHERE UPPER(p.p_name) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{param1}), '%') OR UPPER(c.mainname) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{param1}), '%') OR UPPER(c.subname) LIKE CONCAT('%', UPPER(#{param1}), '%') ORDER BY p.p_rank, p.p_name;
WHERE main_cate = #{param1} AND sub_cate = #{param2} ORDER BY p_rank, p_name
